name: Rhythm Go
description:
If you can't resist music, neon and hoverboard, then Rhythm Go was just made for you!

◆ Rhythm reaction game using just one finger!
Slide and glide to enjoy the music rhythm!

◆ A variety of music song packs
EDM, RAP, POP! Conquest levels and earn more songs!

◆ Assemble your DJ appearance
All sorts of cool DJ helmet and hoverboard for you to customize!

◆ Fantasy world and scenery
Evil Duke strikes! All melodies on earth are trapped in his tesseracts!
Put on your headphones, step on your hoverboard, save the world of music!
